ing: 2 (14.5 ounce) cans diced tomatoes in juice
3 red potatoes, cut into bite-size pieces
1 teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste
des: "Greek-style green beans with tomatoes and potatoes cooked in olive oil. This dish may be served warm or cold. As a nice option, top with crumbled feta cheese."
ins: Heat 1/4 cup olive oil in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir onion until tender, about 10 minutes. Mix remaining olive oil, green beans, tomatoes, potato, mint, parsley, salt, and pepper into onion, adding enough water to cover the whole mixture. Bring liquid to a boil, reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer until potatoes are tender, about 1 hour.
